modName: Drinking Fountains of Skyrim - Brazilian Translation
summary: Tradução Brasileira do Mod - Drinking Fountains of Skyrim adiciona fontes de água ao redor de Skyrim, Mod muito bom pra quem usa o Realistic Needs and Diseases.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/SzlOw2oQbNg6yqg2wQZnRGlqq1mnm6erQYhvhM-47QM=w460-h207-p-no[/img][/center]

Tradução Brasileira do Mod - Drinking Fountains of Skyrim adiciona fontes de água ao redor de Skyrim, Mod muito bom pra quem usa o Realistic Needs and Diseases. Eu traduzir pra duas versões do Drinking Fountains of Skyrim.

[color=green]1ºVersão: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24282/?]Drinking Fountains of Skyrim[/url]

2ºVersão[color=#FF0000](Necessário 1ºVersão)[/color]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34010/?]Drinking Fountains of Skyrim - Dragonborn[/url][/color]

Criação do Mod: mannygt
Tradução: BrawlM1
Colaboradores: /

Brazilian Translation of the Mod - Drinking Fountains of Skyrim adds water sources around Skyrim Mod very good for those who use the Realistic Needs and Diseases. I translate for two versions of Drinking Fountains of Skyrim.

[color=green]1st Version: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24282/]Drinking Fountains of Skyrim[/url]

2nd Version[color=#FF0000](Required 1st Version)[/color]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34010/]Drinking Fountains of Skyrim - Dragonborn[/url][/color]

Creation of Mod: mannygt
Translation: BrawlM1
Collaborators: /
author: BrawlM1
